Testing conversion event tracking code. It just keeps on circling and wont finish. I inserted the snippet correctly I believe

It sounds like you're having trouble with the conversion event tracking code. Could you let me know which platform you're using to integrate the NewsBreak Pixel? For example, are you using Shopify or GTM? This will help me provide more specific guidance.

Thanks for letting me know you're using Shopify. Here are some steps you can follow to troubleshoot the issue:
1. Ensure that the customer event is correctly configured in Shopify.
2. Test the event in both Shopify and NewsBreak to ensure it triggers correctly.
3. For a complete_payment event, simulate a product purchase to verify the setup.
If you've already done these steps and the issue persists, you might want to check out our detailed guide on integrating NewsBreak Pixel with Shopify: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify).
If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.
how do I add money to my account

To add money to your NewsBreak account, you can follow these steps:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak advertiser account.
2. Navigate to the 'Billing' section.
3. Select 'Add Funds' and choose your preferred payment method.
4. Enter the amount you wish to add and confirm the transaction.
If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.
I dont have the add funds option

It seems like the option to add funds might not be available for your account yet. This could be due to certain requirements not being met. To enable the ad credit functionality, your account needs to:
1. Complete and pass business verification.
2. Accumulate over $5,000 in spend.
3. Establish a relationship with an Account Manager (AM), who can then request the ad credit functionality to be enabled for you.
If you believe this is an error or need further assistance, please contact our Ad Support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
Sure, go ahead with your next question! I'm here to help.
How do I add images to my pending ad that  have already made

To add images to an ad you've already created on NewsBreak, follow these steps:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak advertiser account.
2. Go to the 'Campaigns' section and find the ad you want to edit.
3. Click on the ad set or ad level where you want to add images.
4. Select 'Edit' and then choose 'Add Media' or 'Change Image'.
5. Upload your desired images and save the changes.
Make sure your images meet the required specifications for optimal display. If you need more detailed guidance, feel free to check out our help center or reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.
